dcterms:description: The Cityscapes dataset is made up of a variegated set of video-sequenced images from fifty cities in Europe, mostly Germany and some other cities. The dataset contains five thousand finely annotated images, with the training and validation set consisting of 3425 images, and 1525 images used for testing purposes. It provides a diverse range of urban scenes captured from a moving vehicle across different seasons.
dcterms:title: Cityscapes Dataset
